java.lang.Runnable
public class EventThread
extends java.lang.Thread

This class processes incoming JDI events and displays them

Returns:

run

public void run()
Run the event handling thread. As long as we are connected, get event sets off the queue and dispatch the events within them.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
Overrides:
run in class java.lang.Thread

setEventRequests

void setEventRequests(boolean watchFields)
Create the desired event requests, and enable them so that we will get events.

Parameters:
watchFields - Do we want to watch assignments to fields

handleEvent

Dispatch incoming events

handleDisconnectedException

void handleDisconnectedException()
A VMDisconnectedException has happened while dealing with another event. We need to flush the event queue, dealing only with exit events (VMDeath, VMDisconnect) so that we terminate correctly.
